snippet: Republican efforts to resolve the fiscal standoff that has closed much of the federal government heated up Thursday, with new talks over a broad budget deal and an effort by more moderate House members to break the logjam.
abstract: Republican efforts to resolve the fiscal standoff that has closed much of the federal government heat up, with new talks over a broad budget deal and an effort by more moderate House members to break the logjam.

byline.contributor: Jackie Calmes, Mark Landler and Jeremy W. Peters contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Republican efforts to resolve the fiscal standoff that has closed much of the federal government heated up Thursday, with new talks over a broad budget deal and an effort by more moderate House members to break the logjam.

headline.main: Rattled Congress Seeks Way Out of Its Standoff
headline.print_headline: Rattled Congress Seeks Way Out of Its Standoff
